Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Radiopharmaceutical Compound/Radioimmunoconjugate/Indium I 111 Bevacizumab
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A radioimmunoconjugate comprised of the recombinant humanized monoclonal antibody bevacizumab conjugated with the gamma-emitting radioisotope indium In 111. Indium I 111 bevacizumab binds to vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF), allowing the detection of VEGF distribution using gamma scintigraphy.
